home.title: My Resumes
home.noResumes: No resumes found. Create or upload your first resume
home.hasResumes: View saved templates and run assessment with one click
home.description: Create a new resume from scratch or upload a ready PDF to get ATS assessment and tips
home.deleteConfirm: Delete this resume? It cannot be restored.
home.deleteError: Failed to delete resume. Please try again later

title.title: Create Resume
title.subtitle: Step 1: Personal Information and Contacts
title.description: Specify your target position and contact details so recruiters can reach you
title.contactRequired: Please provide at least email and phone so employers can contact you.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Step 2: Tell Us About Yourself
about.description: Enter information about yourself, and we'll help create a professional resume text
about.rawTextPlaceholder: For example: I've been working as a frontend developer for 5 years. Specialize in React and TypeScript. Participated in development of large projects...
about.canEdit: You can edit the generated text if needed
about.enterInfoFirst: Please enter information about yourself first

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: Step 3: Add Work Experience
experience.description: Add places of work. You can add multiple entries.
experience.jobDescription: What you did / What you accomplished
experience.jobDescriptionPlaceholder: For example: Developed user interfaces on React. Participated in code review. Optimized application performance...
experience.canEditDescription: You can edit the generated description if needed
experience.fillRequiredBeforeContinue: Fill all required fields before continuing
experience.endDateRequired: Specify end date or check 'Currently Working Here'
experience.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in company name and position
experience.enterInfoFirst: Please enter information about what you did first
experience.generationError: Error generating description. Please try again.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Step 4: Add Skills
skills.description: Add the skills you have. You can use AI suggestions or add manually.
skills.skillInputLabel: Enter a skill or several skills separated by commas
skills.skillPlaceholder: For example: React, TypeScript, Figma or just React
skills.skillHint: ðŸ’¡ You can enter multiple skills separated by commas or press Enter to add
skills.loadSuggestionsError: Failed to load suggestions. You can add skills manually.

languages.title: Languages
languages.subtitle: Step 5: Add Languages
languages.description: Specify languages you speak and your proficiency level.
languages.selectOrEnter: Select language or enter your own

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.subtitle: Step 6: Add Recommendations (Optional)
recommendations.description: If you have recommendations, add them. This is an optional step.
recommendations.name: Full Name *
recommendations.saveError: Error saving resume. Please try again.

preview.error: Failed to evaluate resume. Please try again.
preview.aiError: AI did not return a response
